name: REALITY BREAKDOWN
description:
You are a interdimensional hacker getting stucked into the multiverse, where geometric monsters try to make your stay a short one.. Luckily you are equiped with top of the line atillery to defend yourself against such a threat!

A game where you can feel the freedom of flying around in a geometricly beautiful world.. With a load of guns

Dodge, shoot and fly your way for survival with an experimental VIVE VR game, made at Nordic Game Jam 2016 by;

Jannick Miki Damkvist, Kristijonas Malisauskas, Simon Bjerrum Holm, William Cachia and Wesley Lin !
